Iris SXSE

Agency:

Iris Worldwide

Challenge:

To build a small one-page website to promote the Iris SXSE exhibition. The site had to be modular as once the exhibition was over the page was to be modified with modules replaced and new ones added.

Solution:

The site was built using HTML, SASS and JavaScript. I used SASS to help me modulize the site within the build, and JavaScript added for some of the functionality. PHP was used for the contact form.

Features:

  • ->  Modular build
  • ->  Contact Form

Technology:

HTML, SASS, JavaScript, Node.js, Gulp, PHP
